name: Subdermal Silicone Granulomatosis
chief_complaint: Lumpy, painful areas where I got cosmetic fillers years ago
physical_findings: palpable 5-15mm firm nodules along nasolabial folds

lab_results.biopsy: foreign body giant cell reaction with silicone droplets

prognosis: Good with treatment but may require multiple interventions
description: Delayed inflammatory reaction to migrated or degraded silicone fillers, causing granuloma formation years after initial injection. Often presents with multiple firm subcutaneous nodules in facial areas where fillers were previously placed.
